Other Information.Test Conditions: –0.25 V vs Ag/AgCl, Full spectrum light illumination
Other Information.Additional Info: Photogenerated holes accumulate at TiO2/NTU-9/electrolyte interface, allowing small molecules like H2O2 to pass through NTU-9 shell.

Other Information.Test Conditions: –0.25 V vs Ag/AgCl, Full spectrum light illumination
Other Information.Additional Info: Larger glucose molecules are excluded by the NTU-9 shell due to size-dependent sieving.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale based on NTU-9 layer spacing

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Photocurrent response of 30 µA against H2O2 (0.1 mM)

Other Information.Additional Info: The NTU-9 shell serves as a size-exclusion filter, enabling selective PEC sensing for small molecules like H2O2 at low applied potentials.
